description: i'm really happy to have a pixel art app on Linux!
I realy liked it
does not open the ico-file. after running can't to be closed

I've been using this for a long time and wrote a review a while back which I deleted since it wasn't that truthful. So basically, theres some features to the app that are great but some that everyone needs and I'll list some:

So, there is no Unzoom feature. That's just dumb to be honest; you make a feature that does something you can't undo.

There's no delete option in the tools and you have to manually do it.

Deselecting is hard since you do it like you with delete.

The fact there's no EASTER EGGS

Many other opinions are filler and not really that useful

There's only a select amount of space you can work around with when using smaller sizes.

Well done if you seen all of them.
I give you this cinnamon bun.
 __
( o )
crashes on open image. ubuntu 20.

"It likes to crash into a new window"- First, start Ubuntu up with Advanced Options (should be the second option in GRUB) - choose Recovery mode or whatever- Ubuntu should start up with limited graphic settings. Open PikoPixel..it should open up normally..then draw some scribbles on a 32x32 image. Save it as a default piko file and restart the computer. Open up the image in PikoPixel and it should work fine as normal. Yay!

Es gibt große Probleme, zumindest bei mit Kubuntu. Der Text wird in der Regel weiß angezeigt und bei den Schaltflächen ist ebenfalls kein Text zu sehen, also man darf nur raten was man so auswählt. Keine Ahnung ob eine Abhängigkeit fehlt, aber wie im Screenshot sieht es leider nicht aus.
Ein schönes Programm.
este juego no me gusta para nada es muy feo  lo tienen que borrar
a las personas que dicen que es un juego que sepan que esta en la categoria de programas inclusive su descripcion dice que no es un juego que es una aplicacion para hacer pixelart
summary: Esto no es un juego es un programa
